dt-option.name: searchBuilder.conditions.date
dt-option.summary: An array of objects containing the conditions for the date type

type.description: An array of objects that hold the details of the conditions used for the date type.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.conditions.date` option is an array of Objects in the form of `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type]`.
dt-option.description: This is useful as it allows extra date conditions to be defined that can add to the filtering options.
